comments.body:
Now that #52189 is merged:
```suggestion
         - output.can_talk_to_docker == true
         - output.docker_swarm_active == false
         - output.docker_swarm_manager == false
         - 'output.msg == "Error running docker swarm module: must run on swarm manager node"'
```

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +15,19 @@      that:
         - 'output is failed'
         - 'output.msg == "Error running docker swarm module: must run on swarm manager node"'
         - 'output.can_talk_to_docker == true'
         - 'output.docker_swarm_active == false'

comments.body:
You should investigate the output (and probably remove `ignore_errors: yes`).

Some things to check:
```
         - output.can_talk_to_docker == true
         - output.docker_swarm_active == true
         - output.docker_swarm_manager == true
```
Sure that code is before the #52189, so this is cosmetic if generally it is what it is supposed to be :)

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +35,39 @@  - name: Try to get docker_swarm_facts when docker is running in swarm mode and as manager
    docker_swarm_facts:
    register: output

  - name: assert creding docker swarm facts
